title: Dime
creator_credit: Larry Klingman and Little Red Filmhouse
brief_description: Follows the circulation of a dime from the mint through many changes of hands. Explores the various functions of money from its use as a means of exchange for goods and services to coin collecting. Concludes as a young boy tries to retrieve the coin from a storm drain and put it back into circulation.
